Spectacular tapas breakfast in the middle of the bustling market. "if the unicorn existed, you'd find it here". Watch the flames erupt in the cooking waltz. 5 chefs in 3 square metres performing with passion for food. If you don't get a seat the first time you pass, come back in 5 mins, then back in 10 if there is stil no space. But don't give up. You just have to try the crab burger.
